newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Austereo advises no action on offer.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Austereo advises no action on offer.

text.p: Radio group Austereo Ltd said on Friday it advises its shareholders to take no action on Village Roadshow Ltd's bid to buy the remaining stock in Austereo that it does not already own.
Village, a cinema and theme park operator, owned 52.83 percent of Austereo before it launched the bid A$2.35 per Austereo share bid on Thursday.
At 3.50 p.m. (0450 GMT), Austereo shares were seven cents up at A$2.50, while Village shares were 18 cents down at A$4.57.
